website_summaries.verdict: Removes soils and stains from the granite without leaving any streaks behind.
pros: Safe to use on many different countertop surfaces
Uses a pH neutral formula, which will not strip any sealer already in place on the granite countertop
Large bottle delivers a good price per ounce of granite cleaner
cons: Has an odd scent that some people won't like

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but may cause buildup?
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It makes my granite shine. The granite company that installed my granite said that over time, these cleaners can leave a dull film of buildup on the granite. He recommended soap and water, and then use this for when people come over. That is what I do now, so this will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roby

customer_reviews.title: Black Granite products are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: My granite is 3 years old and I never knew really what to clean it with. I had made my own cleaner using orange peels and white vinegar. Sure it cleaned it right up, but I didn't realize vinegar was a no no for the surface of granite. So I bought the Black Diamond Granite Countertop Cleaner.and it does a fantastic job. PS: I also used Black Diamond Granite Sealer b/c I hadn't sealed my granite even though it was 3 years old. It's BETTER THAN NEW. I highly recommend Black Diamond Granite products.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great for general cleaning and most things that dull surface.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well to clean Granite countertops. It is easy to use simply spray and wipe. No 2 step processes or extra steps involved. The cleaner works best on soap scum, general grime and drips from cooking that might get on the surface. For thick spots, I recommend using a non-scratch scrub pad first with hot water and a little bit of soap as this product will not clean heavy-duty hardened food/liquid off of surfaces by itself. It does provide some shine after cleaning but not as much as I'd expect from this product although it is very good. I'd say this product is perfect for general granite deep cleaning. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: allstarTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product but poorly designed sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this granite cleaner about a year ago. I really like how it makes your countertop shiny and it smells very pleasant....but every time I use it it really hurts my hand. The sprayer is very poorly designed. As I cleaned my kitchen today, I used a Weimar stainless steel cleaner and it has a normal sprayer that fits comfortably in your hand. But then I picked up this granite cleaner to clean my counterops and I couldn’t believe the difference. It drips a little (making the tile floor slippery) .... and it actually hurts your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for granite!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner for granite! My 10 year old kitchen granite counter tops were hazy after using other cleaners. This particular product smells great and leaves the granite looking brand new. Bear in mind though that my granite (for whatever reason) has never needed professional polishing and has a natural shine when I use this product. This cleaner does not work on marble counters in my bathrooms though. But for granite I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: LIKE NEW AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this several months ago for a home I purchased. The tile floors looked like they had not been cleaned for years. The grout which was supposed to be beige was black. I wasn't sure if this cleaner would work but the reviews were good so I gave it a try. WOW! This cleaner is amazing. Used brush recommended, sprayed grout and tile, waited a few minutes, scrubbed and the grout is again beige and the tile looks new. I love this stuff and will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to product type if you change sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering grout sealer and when I went to toggle to a different size bottle (32oz vs 16) it changed to the granite cleaner and I didn’t notice before purchasing. It’s unfortunate because I opened it and didn’t notice either. I assume it’s not eligible for a refund or exchange but this is a glitch I wanted to point out.
customer_reviews.author: BRM

customer_reviews.title: Makes All the DIFFERENCE IN MY COUNTER TOPS!
customer_reviews.text: Using Black Diamond on my counters daily keeps the granite super smooth and shiny. It feels like their is a protectant on the counters too so spills clean up easier. So how do you pick out which product is the best in this category.... by reviews! I highly recommend this for kitchens, bathrooms outdoor stone counters :). I keep finding more uses for it than I thought, I have even used it on my stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We use Black Diamond products already and have been well pleased with this cost and effectiveness. We steadily use the wood and laminate floor cleaner and also needed something for granite countertops. After some research we found this. It does a good job of cleaning the counter tops and does not leave a residue behind. Easy to use...........just spray on and wipe.
customer_reviews.author: TheWaldo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Its magic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I was cleaning out one of my pantries and came across an old bottle that my mom had left behind before she moved out. There was just a little bit left so I decided to try it. It was like magic. So I had to go online to find out if this product still existed and flaking me they sell it on Amazon. I swear by this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff works great on my Quartz counter top ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff works great on my Quartz counter top and marble counter top! I even bought the gallon to have so we can refill once it's used will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on tile/grout with fresh scent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product specifically to use on the tile and grout in my shower. In the first picture, you can see the original state of the grout at the top and at the bottom you can see as I was scrubbing how clean the grout was getting. The second picture is of the final cleaned tile and grout. The scent on this product is absolutely amazing. I was incredibly satisfied with this product. It worked extremely well. I did purchase a separate tile scrub brush and had to put some work into scrubbing the tile, but the tile came clean pretty quickly upon one quick scrub. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: April Nefferdorf

customer_reviews.title: A +
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I’ve boyght for my countertops. We have darker granite and it cleans so well. Streak free. Leaves a nice protective layer on top. Wish I had bought this 4 years ago.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with delivery but product seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in product the spray cap was completely broken and useless. I have no problem with the product so far but have to pour it out on the counters rather than being able to spray it on cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended

customer_reviews.text: This could be a squirt of generic soap in a large bottle of water. Nothing spectacular. The spray bottle leaks and runs onto your hand and the bottle and drips on the floor. What a waste of money.

customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I thought this product would return the shine to my polished granite bathroom floors. It seemed to clean well, However no shine returned. I’m guessing the only way to get that polished granite look again is to rent a buffer.

customer_reviews.title: Elbow Grease
customer_reviews.text: It cleans ok, but not if heavily soiled or if something is dried on. For heavily soiled areas you need to scrub. It does leave a nice finish.

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Must Have for Granite Counters
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new house with granite counters. I had heard I needed special cleaners for them, and man, do you ever! Regular cleaners do an okay job, but Black Diamond made all the difference in the world! No streak, no greasiness, and it even had a fairly pleasant smell. I'm glad I found it and I'll be purchasing it again when mine runs out.

customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my granite countertops. It cleans them and makes them shine real well

Also my bottle did come with a sprayer, which some customers complained was missing, it is just included separately for mailing purposes.

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Stoneworks Granite Counter Cleaner: USDA Certified BIOBASED- Safe for Granite, Quartz, Marble, Travertine, Countertops. (1-Quart)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 QuartBlack Diamond Stoneworks' Granite Cleaner is a premier product designed specifically for the care and maintenance of high-end Granite, Marble and Tile counter tops. Granite is the fastest growing counter material in the United States. Due to the high cost and unique properties of this material, owners need a product specifically designed for Granite and other high end counter tops. This 100-percent biodegradable daily cleaner is safe to use on all kitchen, bath and other marble, granite and tile counter tops. The streak-free formula has been tested and approved by marble and granite professionals to quickly remove dirt and grime from tile and stone counter tops without leaving behind soap scum, streaks or a rainbow effect that is common in "All Purpose" cleaners. The pH neutral formula is gentle and will not remove expensive and time consuming sealers. With daily use Granite Cleaner helps to maintain stones factory finish with a brilliant, streak-free shine. Made in USA.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tired of dull or streaked countertops? Granite Cleaner is a PH neutral cleaner for use on granite, marble, travertine, limestone, ceramic tiles and other man-made and natural surfaces. Leaves your counters looking great without leaving dulling residue or streaks. This convenient 32-Ounce spray bottle makes cleaning easy. Use daily. For added protection and cleaning ease use Black Diamond Polish Preserver every two weeks and seal once a year with Black Diamond Nex-Gen Stone Sealer.
